articles.title: Is AMD’s Soaring AI Fueled Share Price Still Justified in 2025?
articles.mainIdea: Is AMD’s Soaring AI Fueled Share Price Still Justified in 2025?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Is AMD’s Soaring AI Fueled Share Price Still Justified in 2025?. If you are wondering whether Advanced Micro Devices at around $215 a share is still a smart buy or if the big gains are largely behind it, you are not alone. This is exactly the question we are going to unpack. The stock is up 8.5% over the last week and 78.3% year to date, building on a 70.3% gain over the past year and a 243.7% return over three years that has reset expectations and risk perceptions for investors. Recent headlines have focused on AMD expanding its presence in artificial... Related tickers mentioned: NVDA.

articles.title: Nvidia makes its biggest purchase ever
articles.mainIdea: Nvidia makes its biggest purchase ever
articles.summary: TheStreet: Nvidia makes its biggest purchase ever. According to CNBC, Nvidia has agreed to pay about $20 billion in cash for Groq, a specialist in AI accelerator chips used to power inference—the stage where trained AI models actually answer questions, generate text, or drive real-time applications. articles.title: US ETF Market Hits Triple Crown While BTC Bleeds and XRP Soars
articles.mainIdea: US ETF Market Hits Triple Crown While BTC Bleeds and XRP Soars
articles.summary: BeInCrypto: US ETF Market Hits Triple Crown While BTC Bleeds and XRP Soars. US ETF market hits triple crown in 2025, but crypto funds diverge—BTC and ETH bleed while XRP and SOL attract record inflows. Related tickers mentioned: ^GSPC.
